text:
Md. Kamal Hossain 
 
AREAS OF EXPERTISE 
 
PERSONAL SUMMARY 
Network Administration 
System administration 
Server Configuration 
IT & Desktop support 
Network Services Support and 
Management 
VMware Virtualization 
Citrix Virtualization 
Linux Server Administration 
Wi-Fi Network Administration 
FTTH Technology 
MikroTik Network Configuration 
CCTV Operation Control and 
Configuration 
 
 
Possessing a proven ability to administer and control the operation, 
configuration, maintenance and administration of Network, System, 
Server Configuration, IT and Desktop support as well as having an 
eye for detail and able to multi-task under pressure. An excellent 
communicator can relate well with people at all levels and has the 
flexibility of working well as part of a team and on my own. 
 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
 
Sub. Asst. Engineer IT November 2012  September 2018 
Leading University  Bangladesh 
Duties and Responsibility: 
 
 Building, configuration and troubleshooting of server, and desktop 
hardware. Providing advice on the selection and purchase of IT 
equipment. 
 Maintaining maximum availability of supported services for users. 
 Ensuring that support calls are logged and handled effectively and 
efficiently. 
 Ensure adequate antivirus protection & solutions are maintained, and 
updated. 
 Troubleshooting and solving networking issues - TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, 
Layer 2/3 network devices. Troubleshooting hardware and Software 
problems. 
 Installation, Configuration and Administration of DNS Server, DHCP 
Server and NAT Server etc. 
 Install, upgrade, support and troubleshoot Windows OS, Linux OS, 
authorized desktop applications, hardware, and peripheral equipment. 
 Coordinate and execute preventative maintenance and remedial repairs on 
computers, laptops, printers, and peripherals. 
 Monitor, operate, manage, troubleshoot, and restore service to terminal 
service clients, PCs, or laptops. 
 
KEY SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES 
 
 Good understanding of Server Hardware Technology, UNIX, 
WINDOWS, SQL, LANs, WANs. 
 
 Experience in VMware, Citrix, Windows, Linux, Active Directory 
Group Policies, TCP/IP, DNS, HDCP, NAT, and Apache HTTP 
Server. 
 
 Programming Skills: C/C++/Java, HTML, CSS, MySQL, and 
MATLAB. 
 
 Network and System Security (Hands on Experience): Manual SQL 
Injection, No redirect Exploit, DDOS attack, Shell Upload (XSS), 
Nessus Vulnerability Scanner, Acunetix Security Testing Tool. 
 
 Hands of experience on Backtrack Linux. Install and configure 
various switches, router, and other networking devises. 
 
 Tools: Cisco Packet Tracer, MikroTik, Winbox, Microsoft Office 
Suite, Office 360 and Microsoft Visual Studio etc. 
 
ACADEMIC QUALIFICATIONS 
 
 
Masters in Computer Science and Engineering 
Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (SUST), Course Complete 
Thesis Ongoing. 
 
BSc (Hons) in Computer Science and Engineering 
Leading University Sylhet, Bangladesh 2008  2012 
 
Four (04) Years Polytechnic Diploma in Computer Technology 
Sylhet Polytechnic Institute 2002 - 2006. 
PROFESSIONAL CERTIFICATION 
AND TECHNICAL TRAINING 
CCNA, ID: CSCO11646074

Shahjalal University of Science & 
Technology (SUST)

MCSA, Course Complete

PARTICIPATION
